[Page Title: Sunsets Creekside Bar | Shem Creek | 97 Ronnie Boals Blvd, Mount Pleasant, SC, USA]

top of page FOR THE SHEM CREEK SHUFFLERS 
Join us weekly for

LIVE MUSIC, TRIVIA, AND MORE!
VIEW CALENDAR ABOUT CREEKSIDE bites - and views, too! As sure as the fact that the sun will set, you can count on us - for good drinks, good food, good times, and good views, too! 
Sunsets is nestled along Shem Creek's quaint, yet vibrant waterfront. Guests are welcome to join by land or dock it and kick back with seafood baskets and craft cocktails.
